declarations.name: README
getComponentSharedStyles

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of styles; usually will be `[component-name]-shared-styles`

declarations.description: Get styles (as cssResult) already associated to provided ID string (using setComponentSharedStyles helper) and returns them

declarations.name: setComponentSharedStyles

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of styles; usually will be `[component-name]-shared-styles`

parameters.name: styles
parameters.description: Styles to add, wrapper in a Lit css tagged template literal

declarations.description: Set styles (as cssResult) associated to provided ID string which can then be retrieved by components
